heading: ***WINTER STORM WARNINGS, EXCEPT WINTER WEATHER ADVISORIES NORTH OF RT. 302, AND THE VALLEYS WEST OF THE GREEN MOUNTAINS, THIS AFTERNOON INTO SATURDAY MORNING***Today
text: Early sun northeast giving way to clouds. Snow or a winter mix starting in Hudson Valley and southwest VT by midday, reaching northeast by evening. Highs in the 30s. Winds light, becoming south to southeast 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Any mix changing to snow. Accumulations 4 to 8 inches, except 2 to 5 inches in broader western valleys. Lows in the 20s, teens far northeast. Winds east to southeast 5 to 15 mph, becoming light in sheltered valleys.

heading: Saturday
text: Snow tapering to snow showers. Some breaks of afternoon sun from the Eastern Townships into parts of NH. Additional amounts of a dusting to 2 inches. Highs in the upper 20s to mid 30s. East winds 5 to 15 mph.
